page.title: 20The North Devon Linkroad
page.content: Mr. and Mrs.Joannes live at Filleigh Station which is an old station that has been converted to a bungalow.They have two children,Katherine who goes to South Molton School and David who goes to Filleigh School. The Department of Transport proposes that the South Molton to Barnstaple section of the N.Devon Linkroad should use the route of the old railway line which will mean that their house will have to be demolished. The Joannes are fighting these plans.They have sold square metres of their garden to people all over the world to make the serving of compulsory purchase orders difficult. A public enquiry will eventually decide which route the road wiil take. Katie Russell
